content: **i had uploaded the incorrect file anyone who downloaded this before 5/4/10 should update their version changes are specific to page 2 ** inspired by the blanket angela uses in the la push beach scene of twilight this cushy granny square afghan is guaranteed to keep you warm & snuggly on a chilly night it s la push baby la push this pattern contains no crochet how-to s but if you don t know how feel free to pm me i have a few links saved from when i was learning ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ twin size pictured ~ approximately 45 wide x 63 long lap size ~ approximately 36 wide x 45 long caron one pound 812yrds/742m 16oz/453g white a - 2 skeins green b - 1 skein afghan pictured used the color juniper note be very careful to leave ends of 4 or less so you don t run out of yarn crochet hook size 6 5 mm us k or 10 ½ gauge not really important for this project pictured squares are approximately 9 x9
